arm.name: arm
arm.transformationDescription:
Within a matter of moments, a layer of [npc.armFullDescription] has quickly grown over them, and, looking down, [npc.she] [npc.verb(see)] [npc.her] new chitin recover the backs of [npc.her] hands. At [npc.her] upper-biceps, [npc.her] chitin smoothly transitions into the [npc.skin] that's covering the rest of [npc.her] body.
As the transformation comes to an end, [npc.nameIsFull] left with [style.boldHyena(spitbug arms and hands)], which are [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.armFullDescription].
arm.bodyDescription: [npc.She] [npc.has] [npc.armRows] arms, which are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.armFullDescription(true)]. [npc.Her] hands are formed into bug-like hands, with sharp fingertips.
